about_the_game:
Halloween is the time when twilight warriors emerge from the shadows to do their dark deeds. Only the strongest achieve greatness, and the Twilight Gift set will help with this.
Twilight Advisor
A powerful pet that can save your character from the brink of death or give him a serious ability boost.
Twilight_Warrior Mask (eternal)
The Warrior of Twilight is always impassive, even if your soul is on fire.
Twilight Warrior's Aegis
The best warriors of the Twilight Empire for their deeds are honored to carry it on their backs.
Buying this set, you get items at a big discount!

Halloween is the time when twilight warriors emerge from the shadows to do their dark deeds. Only the strongest achieve greatness, and the Twilight Gift set will help with this.
Twilight Advisor
A powerful pet that can save your character from the brink of death or give him a serious ability boost.
Twilight_Warrior Mask (eternal)
The Warrior of Twilight is always impassive, even if your soul is on fire.
Twilight Warrior's Aegis
The best warriors of the Twilight Empire for their deeds are honored to carry it on their backs.
Buying this set, you get items at a big discount!
name: Twilight gift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual core more than 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 support Geforce 6600, Radeon X1600, 256 Mb RAM and DirectX 9.0c support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual core more than 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 support Geforce 8800, Radeon HD4000, 512 Mb RAM and DirectX 9.0c support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX support

short_description: Halloween is the time when twilight warriors emerge from the shadows to do their dark deeds. Only the strongest achieve greatness, and the Twilight Gift set will help with this.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
